scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && node ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js --standalone daikon ./src/main.js -o ./build/daikon.js && node ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs build/daikon.js -o build/daikon-min.js
scripts.release: rm -rf release/current/*.js && cp build/*.js release/current/. && cp -r build dist
scripts.doc: rm -rf build; mkdir build; ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md src/*.js > build/docs.md
